sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Farmers' Market Technology Improvement Program Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Farmers' Market Technology Improvement Program Act.

sections.heading: Implementation of regulations. The Department of Human Services shall adopt necessary rules and shall implement the program by March 31, 2011.
sections.text: Implementation of regulations. The Department of Human Services shall adopt necessary rules and shall implement the program by March 31, 2011.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2010.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2010.
